channel.title: RuneRefliction - w/Updated Client (now added)
channel.description:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/717/runerefliction.png/][IMG]http://img717.imageshack.us/img717/5153/runerefliction.png[/img][/URL]
Well, I looked at the download section and I saw people using this, so I thought I might as well clean this thread up a bit more. [i]I've finally found the client; which was on my computer, so you should be able to use it.[/i] There's more content, that I didn't take pictures of, so you'll have to explore. This base is fun to play, code and use. Enjoy.
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?7opym0v88w8c89j]Client[/url] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?clpla2a4fx9dc3c]Source[/url]
Protips:
if you want to use another client you'll have to change the UID, to yours; this was implemented to stop bots like allgofree from logging in.
[code] public static final int CLIENT_UID = 75896154;[/code]
i've removed the switching to the original one, if you want to make the process packets more responsive (when you click an item, you instantly wear it; if you +1), then:
[code] public static final int MAX_PACKETS_PROCESS = 40;[/code]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/802/54748655.png/][IMG]http://img802.imageshack.us/img802/9052/54748655.png[/img][/URL]
[font=verdana]Started shortcuts Fully working reporting system, read, writes, checks and loads the player from a file. New Travelling system Most npcs added Clipped following New clan chat system Started on most objects used Fixed switching - a lot smoother and faster Added a fully working gliding system Just finished the new Membership system, works beautifully Created a PathFinder system[/font] Fully working boat system - all boats work Ring of Duelling and glory works Spirit trees all work Fully working skillcapes - can't move whilst emote is active Every single random event, fully working Treasure trails Drop party system Clipped npcs Flower planting - 100% clipped, pickable and all flowers work
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/11/miniga.png/][IMG]http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/633/miniga.png[/img][/URL]
Pyramid plunder added - 4 working floors, receive sceptre's and statues. Occasional anti-poisons collected and a one minute timer Fully working Pest control; all monsters, real timers and portals work Tzhaar fight pits; correct countdown and winners Tzhaar fight caves; 63 waves Warriors guild; animated armours and defenders from cyclops's Barrows; all barrows bosses with digging and the correct tunnel for rewards Duel arena; all features working Zombie minigame; needs few adjustments Fishing trawler; basic shop and timer
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/215/skillsba.png/][IMG]http://img215.imageshack.us/img215/3900/skillsba.png[/img][/URL]
Clipped firemaking + all logs works including different coloured logs Woodcutting fully working, with stumps and birdnests Mining fully working with ores dissapearing Fully working herblore with all levels and ingredients working Cooking; every food-type cook-able and burning Agility fully working with every location; including barbarian assault Runecrafting working with talisman locating Crafting fully working; all leathers and bars Thieving with working with random events Fletching; every single log in the database (cut-able) Fishing; all fish fish-able Farming; all seeds farm-able
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kIozapiq7uE[/youtube]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/9qcxf7.png[/img] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/851/49608801.png/][IMG]http://img851.imageshack.us/img851/6375/49608801.png[/img][/URL] What is wrong with it?
[/quote]

RS2 user client - release #317
java.net.UnknownHostException: revolutionx.zapto.org
at java.net.Inet6AddressImpl.lookupAllHostAddr(Native Method)
at java.net.InetAddress$1.lookupAllHostAddr(Unknown Source)

at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source)
at java.net.InetAddress.getByName(Unknown Source)

at client.main(client.java:2724)
Trykk en tast for å fortsette…

Thats what errors I get…[/quote]
Change the server IP.
